00434    struct ImageSize {
00435       ImageSize( uint32 width, uint32 height ):
00436          m_width( width ),
00437          m_height( height ) {
00438       }
00439 
00440       bool operator < ( const ImageSize& other ) const {
00441          if ( m_width != other.m_width ) {
00442             return m_width < other.m_width;
00443          }
00444          return m_height < other.m_height;
00445       }
00446 
00447       uint32 m_width; 
00448       uint32 m_height; 
00449    };
00450
